title: Rational design of g-C3N4/CdS/MIL-125(Ti)-derived TiO2 ternary heterojunction as highly efficient photocatalyst for wastewater treatment under visible-light irradiation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00403E, Paper
Jiaqi Wang, Hongyang Huo, Guozhe Sui, Shuang Meng, Dongxuan Guo, Shanshan Fu, Dantong Zhang, Xue Yang, Jinlong Li
The development of visible-light-active photocatalysts with high performance has been regarded as a promising way to address environmental wastewater issues. In this work, a highly efficient g-C3N4/CdS/TiO2 ternary heterojunction photocatalyst...
